alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 10:11PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN CROW WING COUNTY THROUGH 1045 PM CDT... At 1011 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Long Lake, or 9 miles southeast of Brainerd, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Upper South Long Lake around 1020 PM CDT. Brainerd around 1025 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Crosby, Ironton, Deerwood and Cuyuna. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
